text.text_translated:
A lifeboat is a small boat. It helps people when a big ship has a problem.

At first, Pi is very scared of the animals. He jumps into the ocean. But he sees hungry sharks in the water. He knows he has only one choice. He must climb back into the boat.

On the boat, the animals kill and eat each other. Soon, only Pi and the tiger are left. Pi names the tiger Richard Parker. Pi is lucky because the tiger is seasick. The tiger does not want to eat him now.
